details: Launched on 2nd October, 1975, the Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS) Scheme is one of the flagship programmes of the Government of India and represents one of the world’s largest and unique programmes for early childhood care and development.
eligibility: Children in the age group of 0-6 years.
Women from age group 14-18 years of UT Chandigarh.
application_process: Offline. The citizen need not apply to the scheme. Visit the nearest Anganwadi center.
